eu_initiatives: European Research and Innovation Programme: Horizon 2020, next Framework Programme (FP9)
organisation_name: European Road Transport Research Advisory Council (ERTRAC)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: ERTRAC is the European Road Transport Research Advisory Council. It is the European technology platform which brings together road transport stakeholders to develop a common vision for road transport research in Europe.
relevant_communication: As a European Technology Platform, ERTRAC has the mission to develop a Strategic Research Agenda for the road transport sector, as well as research and innovation roadmaps on specific topics.
